text:
Any opinions on <https://github.com/JuliaLang/Pkg.jl/pull/2484> ?
Basically it will make packages precompile even if they can’t be loaded during the session. i.e. yellow `✓`’s rather than `?`, which currently delays precomp until the next session and is a bit of an unfriendly UX flow

elements.text:
?
Basically it will make packages precompile even if they can’t be loaded during the session. i.e. yellow
, which currently delays precomp until the next session and is a bit of an unfriendly UX flow

text: I think this is a better option, thanks. I agree that the current behavior is unfriendly.

elements.text: I think this is a better option, thanks. I agree that the current behavior is unfriendly.
